Generation VIII.Sword: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.
Generation VIII.Shield: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.

Generation IX.Scarlet: On sunny days, Rolycoly will come out onto grassy plains and roll around. Then it will eat the grass that gets tangled in its wheel-like leg.
Generation IX.Violet: Chunks of the surface of this Pokémon's body that have grown old and flaked off have long been used for fuel as an alternative to coal.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 3 , Galar Mine , Giant's Cap , Motostoke Riverbank Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 3 , Galar Mine , Giant's Cap , Motostoke Riverbank Dusty Bowl , Giant's Seat , Rolling Fields , Stony Wilderness ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Slippery Slope , Frostpoint Field , Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.Scarlet: East Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.Violet: East Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
